sentence: there is a boy walking with his phone.
behind him he has dropped his bookbag and shoes on the floor.
a little ways down the hall his father is walking up with a big basket of laundry.
the boy has headphones in his head.
the boy s bookbag and shoes are in the middle of the room.
the boy is in the living room.
there is a big entertainment center in the middle of the room.
